item.title: Function overwrite
item.description: #include <stdio.h> #include <stdlib.h> #include <string.h> #include <unistd.h> #include <sys/types.h> #include <wchar.h> #include <locale.h> #define BUFSIZE 64 #define FLAGSIZE 64 int calculate_story_score(char *story, size_t len) { int score = 0; for (size_t i = 0; i < len; i++) { score += story[i]; } return score; } void easy_checker(char *story, size_t len) { if (calculate_story_score(story, len) == 1337) { char buf[FLAGSIZE] = {0}; FILE *f = fopen("flag.
